name: HUD Widget
description: Custom HUD element with UI layout and script logic

scripts.description: HUD manager component that controls the custom widget

instructions:
1. Create a .layout file in UI/layouts/ for the widget visual design
2. Edit the HudComponent to load and manage the layout
3. Use GetGame().GetHUDManager() to register your widget
4. Implement UpdateDisplay to show dynamic content
5. Attach the component to the player controller prefab
6. NOTE: UI layout files (.layout) must be created in Workbench's Resource Manager
7. Test by joining a game and verifying the widget appears
